25603,coin_collector,"this is the present state of the game

Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First of all, you could, like, move north. With that done, recover the coin from the floor of the steam room. That's it!
-= Restroom =-
You find yourself in a restroom. An ordinary kind of place. Let's see what's in here.
You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked.
these are the possible verbs you can use: ['drop', 'examine', 'go', 'inventory', 'look', 'take'].

Hey, thanks for coming over to the TextWorld today, there is something I need you to do for me. First of all, make an attempt to move south. And then, go west. Then, make an effort to take a trip west. Following that, make an attempt to take a trip west. Then, pick-up the coin from the floor of the dish-pit. And once you've done that, you win!
-= Steam Room =-
You've just sauntered into a steam room. The room is well lit.
There is an unblocked exit to the south.
these are the possible verbs you can use: ['drop', 'examine', 'go', 'inventory', 'look', 'take'].
